pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
[Description = "Parameter for days to load (history data)."]
shared parDays2Load = 365 meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type number];
shared XX_FISCAL_DAYS_COHR_TAB = let
    XX_FISCAL_DAYS_COHR_TAB = Value.NativeQuery(Snowflake.Databases("mma12090.snowflakecomputing.com","COMPUTE_REPORTING", [Role="GLBMFGOPERATIONSROLE"]){[Name="PROD_DB"]}[Data], "SELECT *FROM PROD_DB.APPS.XX_FISCAL_DAYS_COHR_TAB", null, [EnableFolding=true])
in
    XX_FISCAL_DAYS_COHR_TAB;
shared XXCOH_NETBOOKINGS_VIEW = let
    XXCOH_NETBOOKINGS_VIEW = Value.NativeQuery(Snowflake.Databases("mma12090.snowflakecomputing.com","COMPUTE_REPORTING", [Role="GLBMFGOPERATIONSROLE"]){[Name="PROD_DB"]}[Data], "SELECT *FROM PROD_DB.APPS.XXCOH_NETBOOKINGS_VIEW", null, [EnableFolding=true]),
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(XXCOH_NETBOOKINGS_VIEW, {"ASOF_DATE", "ASOF_DATE_DISP", "BOOKED_DATE", "FISCAL_WEEK_BOOKED", "FISCAL_QUARTER_BOOKED", "FISCAL_YEAR_BOOKED", "REPORTING_ENTITY", "ORDER_NUMBER", "ORDER_LINE", "ORDER_TYPE", "SO_LINE_TYPE", "BILLABLE_FLAG", "CUSTOMER_PO", "CREATED_BY", "ITEM_NUMBER", "ITEM_DESCRIPTION", "PRODUCT_LINE", "PRODUCT_FAMILY", "TECHNICAL_BUSINESS_UNIT", "FORECAST_FIELD", "COMMODITY", "WAREHOUSE", "ORDERED_QUANTITY", "ASP_QUANTITY", "EXTENDED_AMOUNT", "EXTENDED_LIST_PRICE", "APPLICATION_CODE_DESC", "APPLICATION_CODE", "REQUEST_SHIP_DATE", "SCHEDULE_SHIP_DATE", "CUSTOMER_NAME", "CUSTOMER_ALTERNATE_NAME", "CUSTOMER_NUMBER", "BILL_TO_COUNTRY", "SHIP_TO_COUNTRY", "END_USER", "SALESPERSON", "ORDER_STATUS", "CUSTOMER_CATEGORY", "TRANSACTION_CURRENCY", "EXTENDED_AMOUNT_USD", "EXTENDED_LIST_PRICE_USD", "EXTENDED_COST_USD", "LINE_ID"})
in
    #"Choose columns";
shared XXCOH_BILLING_VIEW = let
    XXCOH_BILLING_VIEW = Value.NativeQuery(Snowflake.Databases("mma12090.snowflakecomputing.com","COMPUTE_REPORTING", [Role="GLBMFGOPERATIONSROLE"]){[Name="PROD_DB"]}[Data], "SELECT *FROM PROD_DB.APPS.XXCOH_BILLING_VIEW WHERE Technical_Business_Unit='Excimer' ", null, [EnableFolding=true]),

  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"ASOF_DATE", "ASOF_DATE_DISP", "BOOKED_DATE", "WAREHOUSE", "ORDER_NUMBER", "ORDER_LINE", "ORDER_TYPE", "SO_LINE_TYPE", "REPORTING_ENTITY", "INVOICE_TYPE", "CUSTOMER_PO", "ITEM_NUMBER", "ITEM_DESCRIPTION", "PRODUCT_LINE", "PRODUCT_FAMILY", "TECHNICAL_BUSINESS_UNIT", "FORECAST_FIELD", "COMMODITY", "INVOICED_QUANTITY", "ASP_QUANTITY", "GL_DATE", "REVENUE_USD", "UNIT_LIST_PRICE", "EXTENDED_AMOUNT", "APPLICATION_CODE_DESC", "APPLICATION_CODE", "REQUEST_SHIP_DATE", "BILL_TO_COUNTRY", "SHIP_TO_COUNTRY", "END_USER", "SALESPERSON", "CUSTOMER_NAME", "CUSTOMER_ALTERNATE_NAME", "CUSTOMER_NUMBER", "CUSTOMER_CATEGORY", "FISCAL_WEEK_GL_DATE", "FISCAL_QUARTER_GL_DATE", "FISCAL_YEAR_GL_DATE", "TRANSACTION_CURRENCY", "UNIT_LIST_PRICE_USD", "EXTENDED_AMOUNT_USD", "EXTENDED_COST_USD", "SO_LINE_ID"})

shared XXCOH_BACKLOG_VIEW = let

  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(XXCOH_BACKLOG_VIEW, {"ASOF_DATE", "BOOKED_DATE", "ORDER_NUMBER", "ORDER_LINE", "ORDER_TYPE", "SO_LINE_TYPE", "BILLABLE_FLAG", "HOLD_STATUS", "HOLD_REASON", "REPORTING_ENTITY", "CUSTOMER_PO", "CREATED_BY", "ITEM_DESCRIPTION", "PRODUCT_LINE", "PRODUCT_FAMILY", "TECHNICAL_BUSINESS_UNIT", "FORECAST_FIELD", "COMMODITY", "WAREHOUSE", "BACKLOG_QUANTITY", "ASP_QUANTITY", "UNIT_LIST_PRICE", "EXTENDED_AMOUNT", "APPLICATION_CODE", "APPLICATION_CODE_DESC", "REQUEST_SHIP_DATE", "SCHEDULE_SHIP_DATE", "CUSTOMER_NAME", "CUSTOMER_ALTERNATE_NAME", "CUSTOMER_NUMBER", "BILL_TO_COUNTRY", "SHIP_TO_COUNTRY", "END_USER", "SALESPERSON", "CUSTOMER_CATEGORY", "FISCAL_WEEK_BOOKED", "FISCAL_QUARTER_BOOKED", "FISCAL_YEAR_BOOKED", "TRANSACTION_CURRENCY", "UNIT_LIST_PRICE_USD", "EXTENDED_AMOUNT_USD", "EXTENDED_COST_USD", "ORDER_STATUS", "LINE_ID", "ASOF_DATE_DISP"})

shared XXCOH_MS_SHIPMENT_VIEW = let
    XXCOH_MS_SHIPMENT_VIEW = Value.NativeQuery(Snowflake.Databases("mma12090.snowflakecomputing.com","COMPUTE_REPORTING", [Role="GLBMFGOPERATIONSROLE"]){[Name="PROD_DB"]}[Data], "SELECT *FROM PROD_DB.APPS.XXCOH_MS_SHIPMENT_VIEW WHERE Technical_Business_Unit='Excimer' ", null, [EnableFolding=true]),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(XXCOH_MS_SHIPMENT_VIEW, each Date.IsInPreviousNDays([ENTER_DATE], #"parDays2Load")),
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"ASOF_DATE", "ASOF_DATE_DISP", "BOOKED_DATE", "ORDER_NUMBER", "ORDER_LINE", "ORDER_TYPE", "ACTUAL_SHIPMENT_DATE", "REPORTING_ENTITY", "ITEM_NUMBER", "ITEM_DESCRIPTION", "TECHNICAL_BUSINESS_UNIT", "WAREHOUSE", "CUSTOMER_NAME", "CUSTOMER_ALTERNATE_NAME", "CUSTOMER_NUMBER", "SHIP_TO_COUNTRY", "END_USER", "SALESPERSON", "CUSTOMER_CATEGORY", "FISCAL_WEEK_SHIPPED", "FISCAL_QUARTER_SHIPPED", "FISCAL_YEAR_SHIPPED", "EXTENDED_AMOUNT_USD", "ORDER_STATUS", "LOT_NUMBER", "SERIAL_NUMBER", "SHIPPING_QUANTITY", "SHIPPING_QUANTITY_UOM", "LINE_ID", "ACTUAL_SHIPPED_VS_PROMISED_SHIPPPED", "ACTUAL_SHIPPED_VS_REQUESTED_SHIPPED"})
